org.dblp.mmdb

Class Person

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dblp.mmdb.Record
      • org.dblp.mmdb.Person
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Person>

    public class Person
extends Record
implements java.lang.Comparable<Person>
    A class representing dblp person records.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static byte[] defaultPersonRecord
      Empty XML byte array template for building new Person records.

    • Field Detail

      • defaultPersonRecord

        protected static final byte[] defaultPersonRecord
        Empty XML byte array template for building new Person records.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Person

        protected Person()
        Create a new, empty Person container. This constructor is intended only for extensions, and the implementing class has to take care of initializing all member fields properly.

    • Method Detail

      • getPid

        public java.lang.String getPid()
        Retrieve the PID of this person record.
        Returns:
        The PID.

      • getIdTypes

        public java.util.Set<PersonIDType> getIdTypes()
        Retrieves all external ID types stored in this person record. The internal type PersonIDType.DBLP will be ignored by this method.
        Returns:
        The types.

      • getIds

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getIds(PersonIDType type)
        Retrieves all external IDs stored in this person record matching the given type. Querying for PersonIDType.DBLP will just return a single-item list with the same ID result as getPid().
        Parameters:
        type - The ID type.
        Returns:
        The IDs.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified type is null.

      • idTypes

        public java.util.stream.Stream<PersonIDType> idTypes()
        Retrieves a sequential stream of all external ID types stored in this person record. The internal type PersonIDType.DBLP will be ignored by this method.
        Returns:
        The stream of types.

      • ids

        public java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> ids(PersonIDType type)
        Retrieves a sequential stream of all external IDs stored in this person record matching the given type. Querying for PersonIDType.DBLP will just return a single-item list with the same ID result as getPid().
        Parameters:
        type - The ID type.
        Returns:
        The stream of IDs.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified type is null.

      • getAggregatedMdate

        public java.lang.String getAggregatedMdate()
        Retrieve the most recent mdate String for this record and all attached publications.
        Returns:
        The aggregated mdate.

      • getPublications

        public java.util.List<Publication> getPublications()
        Retrieves an unmodifiable list view of all publication by this person.
        Returns:
        The publications as unmodifiable list.

      • publications

        public java.util.stream.Stream<Publication> publications()
        Returns a sequential stream of all publications by this person.
        Returns:
        The stream of publications.

        public int numberOfPublications()
        Get the number of publications of this person.
        Returns:
        The number of publications.

      • getPrimaryName

        public PersonName getPrimaryName()
        Get the primary name of this person.
        Returns:
        The person name.

      • hasName

        public boolean hasName(java.lang.String name)
        Checks whether this person record carries a certain dblp name.
        Parameters:
        name - The complete name string to look up, including any possible homonym numbers.
        Returns:
        true if this person has the given name, otherwise false.

      • hasName

        public boolean hasName(PersonName name)
        Checks whether this person record carries a certain person name.
        Parameters:
        name - The person name to look up.
        Returns:
        true if this person has the given name, otherwise false.

      • isTrivial

        public boolean isTrivial()
        Checks whether this person record is trivial, i.e., the record does not contain any information beside a single person name. In particular, the record does not include:
        • attributes
        • alias names
        • home page URLs
        • notes
        • cite references
        • is-not references
        Returns:
        true if this person record is trivial, or false if any non-trivial information is present.

      • isNoShow

        public boolean isNoShow()
        Checks whether this person labeled as an unlisted profile.
        Returns:
        true if this person profile is unlisted, otherwise false.

      • isDisambiguation

        public boolean isDisambiguation(boolean checkHeuristically)
        Checks whether this person should be considered a disambiguation pseudo person. If checkHeuristically == true then this method will also perform heuristic checks.

        The heuristic check consists of checking whether a homonymous name with id '0001' exists in dblp.

        Parameters:
        checkHeuristically - Whether to check heuristically.
        Returns:
        true if this person should be considered a disambiguation pseudo person, otherwise false.

      • isDisambiguation

        public boolean isDisambiguation()
        Checks (explicitly and heuristically) whether this person should be considered a disambiguation pseudo person.

        The heuristic check consists of checking whether a homonymous name with id '0001' exists in dblp.

        Returns:
        true if this person should be considered a disambiguation pseudo person, otherwise false.

      • isGroup

        public boolean isGroup()
        Checks whether this person should be considered a group pseudo person.
        Returns:
        true if this person should be considered a group pseudo person, otherwise false.

      • hasAliases

        public boolean hasAliases()
        Checks whether this person record has alias names.
        Returns:
        true if this person has alias names, otherwise false.

      • hasPersonInfo

        public boolean hasPersonInfo()
        Checks whether this person record contains additional person information. This includes:
        • home page URLs,
        • notes (including is-not references), or
        • cite references
        Returns:
        true if this person contains additional information, otherwise false.

      • hasIsNotPersons

        public boolean hasIsNotPersons()
        Checks whether this person has explicitly disambiguated persons listed (i.e., entries in an <note type="isnot"> element).
        Returns:
        true if this person has explicitly disambiguated persons listed, otherwise false.

      • getIsNotPersonNames

        public java.util.List<PersonName> getIsNotPersonNames()
        Retrieves an unmodifiable list view of all explicitly disambiguated person names of this person (i.e., all entries of the <note type="isnot"> elements, if any).
        Returns:
        The explicitly disambiguated person names as unmodifiable list.

      • getIsNotPersons

        public java.util.List<Person> getIsNotPersons()
        Retrieves an unmodifiable list view of all explicitly disambiguated persons of this person (i.e., all entries of the <note type="isnot"> elements, if any).
        Returns:
        The explicitly disambiguated persons as unmodifiable list.

      • getXml

        public java.lang.String getXml()
        Description copied from class: Record
        Return the dblp XML element of this record as a String.

        Non-ASCII characters in the text content of the returned XML are not escaped (i.e., it's encoded as Java UTF-16).

        Specified by:
        getXml in class Record
        Returns:
        The dblp record as a String.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Person other)
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Person>
